sentences.en: At the party we had biscuits, chocolate and lemonade.
sentences.cn: 在晚会上,我们吃了饼干 、 巧克力和柠檬水.

sentences.en: Cookies are just the thing to serve with tall glasses of real lemonade.
sentences.cn: 曲奇就应该搭配高脚杯的天然柠檬汁一起享用。

sentences.en: Fizzy lemonade can be very gassy.
He was pouring ice and lemonade into tall glasses.
sentences.cn: 他正把冰块和柠檬汽水倒进高脚杯里。

sentences.en: I let some lemonade fall on my clothes, and I'm not sure if I can wash it off.
sentences.cn: 我把柠檬汁洒在衣服上了, 不知道能否把它洗掉.

sentences.en: I'm going to get you a lemonade.
sentences.cn: 我去给你拿一杯柠檬汽水。

sentences.en: If the lemonade tastes bitter, sugar it.
sentences.cn: 如果柠檬水发苦, 就加糖.
柠檬水是一种不含酒精的饮料.

sentences.en: Melissa had guzzled gin and tonics like they were lemonade.
sentences.cn: 梅利莎像喝柠檬汽水一样大口地喝着加奎宁水的杜松子酒。

sentences.en: She expected him to ask for a scotch and was rather nonplussed when he asked her to mix him a martini and lemonade.
sentences.cn: 她料想他会要一杯苏格兰威士忌，所以当他请她调一杯马提尼酒加柠檬水时，她有点不知所措。

sentences.en: She sucked up the lemonade through a straw.
She tasted her lemonade, then added more sugar.
sentences.cn: 她尝尝柠檬水, 然后又往里加了点糖.

sentences.en: Whisky is his favorite tipple and lemonade is mine.
sentences.cn: 威士忌是他最喜欢的饮料,柠蒙汁是我最喜欢的.
你要来一杯柠檬汽水吗？

trans.tran_cn: 柠檬汽水，一杯（或一瓶）柠檬饮料
trans.tran_en: a sweet fizzy drink that tastes of lemons
